entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 21. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries this evening. Clearing after midnight. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light after midnight. Low minus 21. Wind chill minus 18 this evening. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Saturday 1 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Snow. High minus 3.
entry.summary: Sunny. Increasing cloudiness late in the morning then snow. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h in the afternoon. High minus 3. Wind chill minus 25 in the morning and minus 9 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Saturday 1 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Snow. Low minus 22.
entry.summary: Snow ending near midnight then clearing. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light near midnight. Low minus 22. Wind chill minus 15 in the evening. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Saturday 1 April 2023
